alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 2:05PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Salt Lake County through 245 PM MDT... At 205 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Jordan, or near Sandy, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, Bluffdale, Little Cottonwood Canyon, Millcreek, Granite, Cottonwood West, Mount Olympus and Little Cottonwood Creek Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 290 and 304. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 123 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
